result_name: Integrating traditional agricultural practices with modern technology for enhanced productivity
result_description: The content of the Planting Date Advisories was developed into messages and disseminated to farmers across Bihar through the dissemination platforms of BAU, JEEViKA and IFFCO kisan. The advisories were approved and accepted by the Convergence Platform in the form of text and audio to be disseminated to farmers across the state.
title: Planting Date Advisories disseminated in Africa
